This is a sentence.
This is another sentence.
And another one.
What do you mean?
No, but you are!
Software v1.1 is great!
Sentence starting after a newline.
Requirement links SHOULD(#R7) be written within parenthesis and start with '#R' followed by a number.
This one is indented and spread over many lines.
Using parenthesis (e.g. HTTP 1.1).
